trans-unit.source: Abstract base class for a serializer that can serialize and deserialize key identifier clauses.
Key identifier clauses are represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause> class and by classes derived from it.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClauseSerializer"></xref> class.
When overridden in a derived class, returns a value that indicates whether the element where the specified reader is positioned can be read as a key identifier clause by the handler.
Checks whether the XML can be read as a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause> of the <xref:System.Type> processed by the derived handler.
An XML reader positioned at the start element of the key identifier clause.
`true` if the XML can be deserialized to a key identifier clause by the handler; otherwise `false`.
When overridden in a derived class, returns a value that indicates whether the specified key identifier clause can be serialized by the handler.
The key identifier clause to check.
`true` if the key identifier clause can be serialized by the handler, otherwise, `false`.
When overridden in a derived class, deserializes a key identifier clause from by using the specified XML reader.
An XML reader positioned at the start element of the key identifier clause to read.
The key identifier clause that was deserialized from the XML.
When overridden in a derived class, serializes the specified key identifier clause.
The XML Writer to use to serialized the key identifier clause.
The key identifier clause to serialize.
